title: How to write a professional thank you letter - Quora

response.answer_text: Write your letter as soon as possible. If you have an informational interview with a contact, send them a thank-you letter by the next day. Explain why you’re writing the letter. Clearly explain what you are showing the appreciation for. Keep the letter short and focused. Keep your letter concise. Be sincere. There’s no need to go over the top in your appreciation. Edit, edit, edit. Be sure to proofread your letter before sending it. Consider the format. You might consider one of three formats: email, a personalized thank-you letter, or in a business letter format.
